article: A woman is going shopping. She is going  _  boat. The boat is going across the river. Her basket is empty . Oh dear! Look! Her basket is in the  _  ."Help!"she says."Look! My basket is in the river." A boy sees the basket. He says, "Don't worry! I can  _  it! I'm a very good swimmer." He takes off his shoes and shirt. "Look  _  my shirt and shoes, please!" he says and then jumps into the river. A  _  sees the basket. "I can go by basket!" it thinks. It gets to the basket. The boy  is swimming  in the river. "Where's the basket?" he calls:"It's over there!" calls the woman. "It's behind you!" It's  _  that duck! The boy gets to the basket."Go away!" he says to the duck. The duck  _  out of the basket and swims away. The boy takes the basket to the land. "Oh, thank you!" says the woman. "Thank you very much!" "Not at all!" says the boy."  _  you like to give me my shirt and shoes?" "Yes, here you are. Oh, what's in the basket? It's the duck's  _  ."
